title: Lana Del Rey speaks publicly for first time about her romance with Live PD's Sean 'Sticks' Larkin
text:
Lana Del Rey is opening up about her romance with police Sgt. Sean 'Sticks' Larkin of A&E fame.

The 34-year-old singer addressed her new relationship with the 46-year-old police sergeant after the couple was seen on a romantic walk in New York City's Central Park last week.

'I didn't know we were being photographed,' the High by the Beach artist told the Los Angeles Times Thursday in an interview. 'I would've worn something different. It's funny because I was with someone for years and we never had that problem.'

Fall felicity: Lana Del Rey, 34, addressed her new relationship with Sgt. Sean 'Sticks' Larkin, 46, after the couple was seen on a romantic walk in NYC's Central Park last week

The Summertime Sadness singer said she understood why fans take an interest in her personal life, relating her own fandom of musical icon Bob Dylan.

'I care about what Bob Dylan is doing right now,' she said. 'I'm curious to know if he's wearing a hoodie or a blazer. I get it.'

Del Rey made headlines last year when she postponed a performance in Israel at the Meteor Festival amid blowback from activists over the sensitive politics of the region. She said it was 'important to perform in both Israel and Palestine and treat all [her] fans equally.'

Asked on Thursday if she believed she would face any flak from her fan base over her romance with the lawman, Lana said, 'Well, the thing is, he's a good cop. He gets it.'

On stage: Lana was snapped September 30 performing in Vancouver, Canada

Fandom: The Summertime Sadness singer, snapped in Seattle Wednesday, said she understood why fans take an interest in her personal life, relating her fondness of Bob Dylan

Focused: The Lust For Life singer was snapped at Seattle's 107.7 The End Wednesday

She added that Larkin - who's been seen on A&E shows Live PD Presents PD CAM and Live Rescue - 'sees both sides of things.'

Del Rey has past kept her love life private; she was previously linked to rapper G-Eazy, amid speculation her single White Mustang was based on their relationship.

Elsewhere in the chat, the 5ft7 beauty said she watches 'a lot of reality TV' and is 'obsessed with The Bachelor.

Asked about the parallels of romance gone wrong in her music and on the ABC series, the Lust For Life singer said that 'it’s brutal out there!'

Del Rey noted that 'even good guys don’t know what toxic masculinity is,' and that she and her friends didn’t either initially.

'We had bad experiences that we didn’t share with each other,' said the Doin’ Time artist, whose full name is Elizabeth Woolridge Grant. 'We were like, "Oh, that was so stupid that I got myself into that." Now, we realize, "Oh, you actually didn’t."'
description: The 34-year-old singer addressed her new relationship with the 46-year-old police sergeant after the couple was seen on a romantic walk in New York City's Central Park last week.
